description.value: When taking this talent Character selects either Ranged or Melee to represent "X" (affects requirements appropriately). When making a Called Shot, character does not suffer the usual -20 penalty. If X is Melee, this applies to melee attacks, if X is ranged, it applies to ranged attacks.
